item.title: Bank manager absconds after Rs 10.9 crore gold loan fraud
item.description: <![CDATA[Raichur : CEN Police in the district received a complaint regarding a bank manager, accusing him of defrauding customers of Rs10.9 crore under the pretext of gold loans.Last week, a complaint was submitted to the CEN police station by Sujeet D'Souza, a zonal officer at Bank of Maharashtra in Vidyanagar, Hubballi. The complaint was against K Narendra Reddy , the manager of the Bank of Maharashtra branch near Gandhi Chowk in Raichur, who hails from the Prakasam district in Andhra Pradesh.The alleg...]]>
item.author: Chamaraj Savadi
